Elita/Nightlight/Kup/windlord/Perceptor::

Perceptor sat down far away the group and said with an unusual not of 
sadness in his voice "One minute in silence for my Greatest Creation of all: 
The Black Fortress... The best base that our kind have ever watched... If I 
were in the mess hall i will drink in its honor till i be totally drunk"

Nightlight continue peacefull sleeping and her vital signals were constant.

*********************************

Elita jumped from her hide out and ran towards Lord Elder's voice and 
concerned said "I'm here!!! How may I help????"

*********************************
Kup and Windlord continued heading at great speed towards the Ark

-----Original Message----- 
From: supercyclonus
Sent: Tuesday, February 15, 2011 1:35 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Back to the Ark!

Meanwhile Outside the Ark

As Uproar and Quickstride wee hatching their new plan to get through the 
shield, Rodimus had been keeping an optic on his internal chronometer, 
watching the time continue to count down.

As the explosion rocked the area of the Black Tower, even at this distance, 
all these miles away, Rodimus' sensors registered a small blip, the 
slightest ripple of the explosion. A quick calculation gave him a true 
estimation of the size.

"NOW!" Rodimus said as he leaped up from their place of waiting and began to 
run towards the shield, he holding the device in his hand. Behind him Leo 
II, Wing Caliber and Ramulus were quickly behind him.

With a quick toss Rodimus sent his device hurtling towards the shield as he 
ran up to it. "Hurry, we have only a few seconds before the shielding 
adapts!"

Inside the Ark

All of the medics, Legacy, Bump, Santon and Perceptor kept a vigil on 
Nightlight, and for the moment her vitals continued to remain steady and 
strong even in their sedated state â€“ her systems were stable and running 
under their own power now.

Legacy looked up, his optic sensor glowing strangely. "Facinating" he said 
as he stood up.

"What is it?" Bump said as he looked over at Legacy, alarm creeping onto his 
face and into his voice.

"I am detecting a distant seismic disturbance." Legacy said after a moment 
of contemplation.

Santon looked at Nightlight as if half expecting this to be affecting her. 
"Where is it coming from?" he said as he now turned to Legacy, for the 
moment confident that this seemed to have no affect on their patient.

Legacy paused for a moment as if examining his internal records. "Unknown" 
he said finally. "I would need full access to the Ark's sensors." Legacy 
looked back at Santon and Bump, "However if this is indeed a result of 
Perceptor's destruction of his former base then the exlosion was truly 
massive on a large scale."

* * * * *

As Legacy and the others talked, the voice that was speaking to Elita 
continued talking, "Elita. I am hurt, badly hurt." It sounded like Lord 
Elder still, but the voice was steadily getting weaker.

There was the sound of crawling and shuffling. "I was ambushed and knocked 
unconscious." The voice paused, "Elita, where are you?"


With the Maximals on the way back to the Ark!

> "Noctorro, Torca, I've regained sixty percent of my energy reserve.
> It should be enough for me to drive on my own now. I thank you
> deeply for your assistance, and wish not to burden you any further.
> After all, towing a vehicle my size and weight, must put quite a strain
> on your systems. I'd rather not see that happen."

"Of course." Torca said in deep tones. "We are always here for the Maximals 
and you Autobots." His tone was grave.

Torca and Bantor who had been the actual ones to help pull began to come to 
a slow halt. They were not fast as most vehicles go, but they were large 
enough. Bantor was perhaps fully the size of a large jungle cat, but Torca 
was as large as a woolly mammoth and looked strong enough to pull Tuscon by 
himself if necessary.

Looking up Torca spoke to Noctorro, "You and Quicksilver get back to the 
Ark. I think we have this under control, the Ark is the most important thing 
now."

"Sir!" They both said in unison as they both began flying off in the 
direction of the Ark.

(OOC: The Maximals might notice now that communications are no longer being 
blocked. They can communicate with each other as well as the Ark.)
